QuestData.Title: Natural Adversaries
QuestData.Description:
I have walked this land in the time since our arrival. Here, basilisks have emerged from the ravines to the east. They encroach upon the home of the Nightsabers.
To earn their blessing, I believe we should clear the way for their return.
Slay the basilisks that have taken more than their fair share of the land, $r.
